title: Rankings
body:
Well I'm quite confessed on how I got my elo,
S5 I got Brnz 1 lost every placment game 1_9
S6 Brnz 5???? 5_5 went even but, S5 I got brnz 1 from losses?

replies.body:
Your placements are largely based on your previous rank at the end of last season.

Unranked accounts are treated roughly Silver 3 level. So they can still get high bronze even with a few losses.

I'm guessing you ended the season Bronze. So it put you back there. Everyone dropped a couple divisons thanks to the rank reset.

This. Assuming you ended up in bronze at the end of S5, you MMR would have endured a "soft reset" (dropping by 2-3 divisions) before you started to play your placements.

 It is then heavily Influenced by the order of your wins/losses -winning earlier on gains more mmr and losing loses more as the system tries to get you in the right bracket as quickly as possible.
